title: GABAergic neurons are a key cell type in a
abstract: The causes of sporadic Parkinson's Disease (PD) are still unclear, despite its prevalence. By contrast, inherited parkinsonian disorders have a clear genetic basis and have been studied intensively in laboratory organisms, including
